name: v2.6
body:
- Add create SMS from intent
- Fix clear notification after edit transaction from it
- Speedup database restore process
- Start refactoring with Dagger, Rx and MVP (Moxy)

name: v2.5.6
body:
- Add preference "Remember last account"
- Allow to create account in select account dialog
- Fix editing amounts issues

name: v2.5.5
body:
- Merge amount integer and fractional parts editors into one
- Fix bugs

name: v2.5.4
body:
• Add transaction editor layout customizing tool
• Fix receipt download issues

name: v2.5.3
body:
• Add ability to attach scanned receipt to early created transaction
• Fix issue with date time parsing in custom CSV import

name: v2.5.2
body:
- Added new preference "Colored category and project tags"
- Improved readability of chart labels
- Fixed product list floating menu issues
- Fixed refresh chart when tap on parent undefined category
- Fixed some other bugs

name: v2.5
body:
- Add tools for bulk editing products
- Add credit limit usage progress bar
- Add preference "PIN lock timeout, seconds"
- Add button to invert transfer direction in transaction editor
- Add "Scan QR" button in notification
- Add button to add difference between sum of products prices and sum of transaction to sum of transaction
- Add display root category with its siblings in pie and bar charts
- Add show error message on receipt download failure
- Replace exclude filter toggle button to switch
- Update EN localization
- Change fraction part in calc from 2 to 4 digits
- Change behavior of split category and project labeler in transactions list
- Fix show date range in reports when date range filter exists but disabled
- Fix change transaction amount when sum of product list changes
- Fix break payee-category pair when save transaction with empty category
- Fix show suggestions in edit category dialig with SwiftKey
- Fix display empty entity on chart (e.g. transactions w/o category on category chart)

name: v2.5-beta.3
body:
- Add display root category with its siblings in pie and bar charts
- Replace exclude filter toggle button to switch
- Fix bugs

name: v2.5-beta.2
body:
• Add tools for bulk editing products 
• Add "Scan QR" button in notification
• Add button to add difference between sum of products prices and sum of transaction to sum of transaction
• Add show error message on receipt download failure
• Fix bugs

name: v2.5-beta.1
body:
- Add credit limit usage progress bar
- Add preference "PIN lock timeout, seconds"
- Add button to invert transfer direction in transaction editor
- Add toast with sums when select value in FragmentTimeBarChart.java
- Add hint "Pull up to create account"
- Update EN localization
- Change fraction part in calc from 2 to 4 digits
- Fix show date range in reports when date range filter exists but disabled
- Change behavior of split category and project labeler in transactions list
- Fix change transaction amount when sum of product list changes
- Fix break payee-category pair when save transaction with empty category
- Fix show suggestions in edit category dialig with SwiftKey
- Fix display empty entity on chart (e.g. transactions w/o category on category chart)

name: v2.4.1
body:
- Fix incorrect account balance after delete transfer
- Fix save filter exclude state
- Fix crash when input target sum

name: v2.4
body:
- New preference "First day of week" (su. or mo.)
- Button to invert ExRate in Transaction Editor
- Auto create payee from marker, when payee empty
- Auto unfold references group when search result hidden
- Currency code and symbol to currency caption in reference view
- New validations when create accounts and transactions
- Fixed issue with parse SMS sums which has trailing currency marker
- Fixed dissapear budget row when clear plan sum
- Fixed isuues with cursor and selection in amount editor

name: v2.4-beta.1
body:
- New preference "First day of week" (sunday or monday)
- Button to invert ExRate in Transaction Editor
- Auto create payee from marker, when payee empty
- Auto unfold references group when search result hidden
- Currency code and symbol to currency caption in reference view
- New validations when create accounts and transactions
- Fixed dissapear budget row when clear plan sum
- Fixed isuues with cursor and selection in amount editor

name: Версия 2.3.3
body:
- Если при загрузке чека поле получатель было пустое, то оно заполнится названием магазина из чека.
- В главном меню вернулись кнопки "Справка" и "Задать вопрос".
- [FIXED] баг с вылетами на android 8.
